mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_account (username, password, pri, disabled) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{pri}, #{disabled});
mapper.update: UPDATE m_account SET password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE m_account SET pri = #{pri}, disabled = #{disabled}, username = #{username} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM m_account WHERE pri = #{pri} LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
